meanings.sent1: The soap made the water bubbly.
meanings.sent2: The soda was so bubbly, it fizzed over.
meanings.sent3: The bubbly bath water made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bubbly as a sparkling stream.
meanings.sent5: The bubbly aquarium was a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: She had a bubbly personality that lit up the room.
meanings.sent2: The children's bubbly laughter filled the playground.
meanings.sent3: His bubbly dance moves entertained everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her bubbly spirit was contagious, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The bubbly puppy bounced around with excitement.

meanings.sent1: They celebrated with a bottle of bubbly.
meanings.sent2: The toast was made with expensive bubbly.
